headline: It’s Been a Memorable Quarter for These AI Stocks
summary: DRAM and NAND flash memory play a crucial role in data centers.  Counterpoint Research says prices have jumped 80% to 90% so far in the first quarter.  The flash memory maker Sandisk has nearly tripled in value in the past three months while Micron has surged by 66%.

headline: 3 Stocks to Buy From the Prospering Semiconductor Industry
summary: The Zacks Electronics - Semiconductors industry players like AVGO, LRCX and AMKR gain from the growing proliferation of AI, ML and consumer electronic devices.

headline: Lam Research Leadership Shift And CEA Leti Alliance Spark Valuation Questions
summary: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) has announced significant executive leadership changes, including the planned retirement of its longstanding COO and the appointment of a successor. The company has also added a new director to its board with distinguished credentials. Lam Research has formed an expanded research alliance with CEA-Leti focused on specialty and next generation semiconductor technologies. Lam Research, a major supplier of wafer fabrication equipment and services, operates at the...

headline: AMAT to Post Q1 Earnings: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: Applied Materials heads into Q1 earnings with AI-driven chip demand and services strength in focus, even as revenues and EPS are expected to dip year over year.

headline: 3 Mega-Cap Stocks to Consider Right Now
summary: Megacap stocks dominate their sectors and their actions influence economies worldwide. The flip side though is that their sheer size means they have less room for explosive growth as scale works against them.
